idea:
Matasha Grocery is an online grocery ordering platform ( Website and google app )

We are a newly set up firm with the name of matashatech Pvt Ltd. Our focus is to encourage local Kirana stores, Local Brands, Homemade food by women and newly set up brands by providing a platform to sell their products and service.


Below is the focus category where we looking forward to catering our service: -

Customers purchase products through their nearest and trusted local shop and merchant. Even customer has the option to purchase through ur special category like food which ade at home, D2C brands, Local special brand, Special shop like spices, pooja need, pets care, baby care etc.


Below is the focus category where we looking forward to catering our service: -

Kirana Shops

Department stores

Special product store

Bakery & Cakeshop

Special spices & Masala shops

Fresh fruit & Vegetables

Fish, Chicken & Meat shop

Sweets and namkeen shops

Pets care

Home & Gardening

Our delivery programme:- We have a flexible plan for our merchant partner.

Self-delivery

Get delivery through our tied up the third party.

Ready to pick up facility, 

Schedule or slotted home delivery facility


What unique facility & Benefit we give to our merchant partners:-

Get new customers all over the place where we actively work as well pan India.

Affordable plan. Can start with minimum price.

Easy product listing through our team.

Easy transaction, easy operations.

flexible return policy, flexible order capping.

Great plan to retain your customer.

Get market information and customer buying habit reports daily from our experienced team.

Our focus is to bring 50 new customers to your shop and help to increase margin.

Maximum visibility through our marketing strategy.

Only focus to make our partners grow so we can grow along with them
name: MATASHA MARKETING AND DISTRIBUTION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
The start up will have two main verticals – Elephant Canvas Design Studio and Nifty Art Exchange. The mission of Elephant Canvas is to take Indian Art to global scale. Technology has already disrupted a lot of industries, but Indian Art is somewhere it hadn’t been able to enter – until now. With the emergence of NFTs and its growing popularity, it’s not long that young creative minds would move to the computer to create Art instead of a paintbrush or clay. As geographical indications have shown that traditional art like madhubani art or gond art have been confined to smaller towns and the technique and skills are not passed on to the next generation, it’s possible that such art is likely to die soon. With NFTs, there may even be a dearth of artists who paint on canvas or make bronze sculptures in the near future. We, through Elephant Canvas want to avoid that and give the respect and recognition to non-digital skill and technique.

Nifty Art Exchange is a marketplace that will be a platform for Artists to partner with us and sell their creativity in the form of NFTs.

Elephant Canvas Design Studio will give 3D and animation services to Artists to digitalize their physical Art.
name: Elephant Canvas LLP
